titles.title: Hunger Clearinghouse Enhancement Act of 2022
Hunger Clearinghouse Enhancement Act of 2022
To amend the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to fund the information clearinghouse through fiscal year 2029, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Hunger Clearinghouse Enhancement Act of 2022
This bill provides funding through FY2029 to the Department of Agriculture for maintaining a clearinghouse that provides information to assist low-income individuals and communities in obtaining nutrition assistance and related resources.
